title: Wells Fargo Readying Thousands of Job Cuts
itunes:title: Wells Fargo Readying Thousands of Job Cuts
description:
We get the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Dr. Crystal Watson, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about the importance of coronavirus contact tracing. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Campaign Finance Reporter Bill Allison discuss Mellon leading 2020 GOP donors and defending the use of racial stereotypes. We get Businessweek Economics with Frances Donald, Chief Economist and Head of Macroeconomic Strategy at Manulife Investment Management. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Hannah Levitt discusses Wells Fargo readying thousands of job cuts to start this year. And we Drive to the Close with David Trainer, CEO at New Constructs.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
